pr_title: [astro] - Fix tiny markdown syntax with bullets at top

timeline.message:
Fixing tiny markdown syntax with bullets at top

Signed-off-by: John Kinsella <jlkinsel@gmail.com>

Fixing tiny markdown syntax with bullets at top

Signed-off-by: John Kinsella <jlkinsel@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: To render as actual dots the indentation before the * should be removed. The newline only makes the code textblock show as code textblock and therefor shows a separate lines.
timeline.author: Hilbrand
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,7 @@
 # Astro Binding
 
 The Astro binding is used for calculating 
+

replies.bodyText: My bad...looked good in my editor but you're right. Fixing.
replies.author: jlk

timeline.message: Fixing markdown bullets right this time
